summary: A long hot summer in rural Norfolk and a rough coming of age for Goob Taylor, fighting with brutal, womanizing stock car racer Gene Womack for his mother's attention, and falling for the exotic charms of a pretty foreign field worker.
cast: Sienna Guillory|Sean Harris|Marama Corlett|Hannah Spearritt|Paul Popplewell|Liam Walpole|Oliver Kennedy|Rosa French|Joe Copsey
keywords: male frontal nudity|boyfriend girlfriend relationship|coming of age|stock car racing|norfolk england
title: The Goob
